definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Above term only apply to dorsa above3,000 bales.
sentences.chinese: 以上条件，仅适用于三千捆以上的订单。

sentences.english: The researchers believe that the findings do apply to humans.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员认为，这项研究结果也适用于人类。

sentences.english: Weights shown for ball valve figures are PVC threaded models.
sentences.chinese: 表中所显示的重量适用于PVC螺纹连接的球阀。

sentences.english: The patterns identified do still apply, but perhaps to a lesser extent.
sentences.chinese: 我们调查的模式仍然适用，但是使用范围要小一些。

sentences.english: Compared with numerical control, its broad future in application is illustrated.
sentences.chinese: 并与数控机械加工比较，说明它适用的广泛前景。

sentences.english: Clay bars should only be used by professionals.
sentences.chinese: 研磨泥只适用于专业类产品吗？

sentences.english: Bentham sums up two principles that are applicable to penalty.
sentences.chinese: 边沁归纳出了刑罚适用的两个基本原则。

sentences.english: The proposition in this paper is also suitable for once-through boiler.
sentences.chinese: 本文所讨论的内容也适用于直流锅炉。

sentences.english: MFN clause generally applies to the substantive problem.
sentences.chinese: 最惠国待遇条款一般适用于实体问题。

sentences.english: The technique is also suitable for the study of thin and inter-bedded reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 本方法也适用于薄互层储层的研究。

sentences.english: Racial feats are available only to characters of a specific race.
sentences.chinese: 种族专长仅适用于人物的特定种族。

sentences.english: By comparing the two we finally find a suitable ellipse fitting method for the environment of sea.
sentences.chinese: 通过比较找出一种适用于海洋环境的椭圆拟合方法。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the suitable control methods of VRM are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 同时对适用于VRM的控制方法进行了论述。

sentences.english: Suitable for packing materials with fine flowability.
sentences.chinese: 适用于流动性好的颗粒料的包装。

sentences.english: What is more, it can be used to joint the alloy copper and alloy tools.
sentences.chinese: 还可适用于合金铜及合金工量具的对接。

sentences.english: Product is only applicable to white paint system to reduce the color of floating and improve adhesion.
sentences.chinese: 产品只适用于白漆体系，减少颜色上浮，提高附着力。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
in keeping with/in accordance with/tallying with/in line with/to agree with/to accord with/to conform to/to correspond with/to manage/to handle
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to exclude/not including sth (when counting or listing)/except for
